original_title: Ring of Fire: Burning Live in Tokyo 2002
overview: Ring of Fire perform in a small Japanese club, in support of their 1st album, Oracle. While almost the entire album is performed live, Mark Boals also had a solo album a couple of years earlier, called Ring of Fire, in which the band draw their name, and several tunes from that solo album are performed here live.
title: Ring of Fire: Burning Live in Tokyo 2002
